title: Are online classes considered full-time? - Quora

response.answer_text: According yo me online classes not to be considered as full time because:- Student can face the eye problems while seating beforescreen for along hours.They may lose the eye brightnessAlso in backward area students may not have the internet facility.The student may not afford the internet connections and cell.

Most Universities pre-covid19 policies would still be in effect. However, post covid19, policy, changes would certainly override any changes prior to their inception. so, if a University decides, that to graduate or obtain credit for a class, the student must attend 75% of lecture, take 6 exams, and obtain a passing grade of 70% on final. Then call it what you want, that's what is required to pass. Which, was typical 10 years ago. I would add, it would have been extremely difficult to pass the exams without nearly 100 % participation in the lectures.
